name: Heavy Illuminator
tags: prv_rb_bp, utility12, energy9, beam10, LR, merc
customPrimary: Increases the range of all ballistic and energy weapons on the ship by %s for the first Illuminator hitting an enemy ship, %s for two Illuminators, and %s for three or more.

name: Belt Blaster
customPrimary: Fires a volley of up to %s shots.

name: Ljungeld (Damaged)
customPrimary: Hits on shields cause the beam to fracture, giving it a chance based on the target's hard flux level to pierce the shield with high explosive arcs of energy.

name: Spatterflamer
tags: prv_rb_bp, energy18, he17, beam12, SR, prv_spatterfire
customPrimary:
%s clings to the target on hull hits, dealing an additional %s energy damage over time. 

Shield hits spread additional plasma particles which will hit any other target for %s to %s energy damage.

name: Remission EMP Mortar
customPrimary: Causes up to %s energy weapons near the impact location to discharge. The discharges deal up to %s EMP damage, based on the size of the discharging weapon.

name: Remission Bounce
customPrimary: Causes up to %s energy weapons near the impact location to discharge. The discharges deal up to %s EMP damage, based on the size of the discharging weapon.

name: Punktskydd Cluster
customPrimary:
Shells have unreliable fuzes and are likely to explode at a random distance, resulting in a barrage that's increasingly more deadly at closer ranges.

Will target missiles if no other targets are in range.

name: Shard Driver
customPrimary: Projectile gradually breaks up and slows down, losing up to %s of its potential damage and leaving a trail of debris, each dealing %s fragmentation damage.

name: Brytare Rocket Launcher
customPrimary: All rockets in a salvo will ignite their engines at the same time.

name: Brytare Rocket Pod
customPrimary: All rockets in a salvo will ignite their engines at the same time.

name: Minehead Cluster Rocket
customPrimary: Leaves a trail of inertia-guided bomblets.

name: Blaster Charge Rack
customPrimary: The missile unleashes an energy blast when it gets near the target, dealing %s energy damage. This damage is affected by missile damage modifiers and not energy weapon ones.

name: Blaster Charge Disperser
customPrimary: The missile splits into %s submunitions each of which unleashes an energy blast when it gets near the target, dealing %s energy damage. This damage is affected by missile damage modifiers and not energy weapon ones.

name: Blaster Charge Launcher
customPrimary: The missile unleashes an energy blast when it gets near the target, dealing %s energy damage. This damage is affected by missile damage modifiers and not energy weapon ones.

name: Sidewinder SRM Launcher
customPrimary: Hits on shields have a chance to arc through to weapons and engines, dealing %s EMP damage. The chance to pierce the shields is based on the target's hard flux level.

name: Splitter Grenade Launcher
customPrimary: Each shell has a fuse set to explode at a random distance, resulting in a barrage that's increasingly more deadly at closer ranges.

name: Brytare Rocket Pack
customPrimary: All rockets in a salvo will ignite their engines at the same time.
